about_the_game:
﹡This game depicts non-consensual and inter-species sex. Please refrain from purchasing if they're not aligned with your preferences.


Loop Queen is the final installment of the Escape Dungeon series.

Shalith and Shunral will join their Queen in "Escape Dungeon 3 - Loop Queen"!
You heard that right! Shalith and Shunral will battle the horniest of monsters alongside Fiara and Queen Illy!
With such a powerful party entering the Misty Forest, will players ever get to see lewd scenes of defeat? Or will the carnage and ensuing orgy overwhelm the four heroines?

Building on the earlier Escape dungeon games, players will be able to control multiple characters. Play to each character's strengths and help them cut down their enemies! This finale to the Escape Dungeon series combines the best aspects of the previous games with significant improvements in gameplay and immersion!

Features:
◇ Control multiple characters over our new hex grid system.


◇ Nearly 30 interactive Live2D-animated H-scenes!



◇ Zoom in and interact with our massive animated & interactive CGs.


◇ It's a rogue-lite! Different encounters lie in wait with each additional loop.
◇ Mix and match from 50 different abilities. Try out something new in every playthrough.


◇ Immerse yourself in the story with a fully-voiced main character.
◇ Unlock CGs through multiple means. You don't have to lose on purpose every time!
◇ Over 26 uniquely challenging bosses!
◇ Explore the Misty Forest, unlock its secrets, and experience the finale of the Escape Dungeon series!
◇ Eager players can switch to easy mode for easier level progression.
◇ Clearing the game will unlock all adult content.
◇ You may toggle all adult content on/off in the options menu.

Story:
Queen Illy was spirited away to the Misty Forest by Shalith the Grand Mage on the eve of their defeat to the Demon Lord.
The Sundista Kingdom was no more, but the elven queen had a powerful ability that could reverse their fortunes.

Her orgasms can manipulate time.

Fiara was also transported to the Misty Forest and assigned by Shalith to act as the queen's bodyguard. She must assist the queen as they search for the legendary ancient phallus hidden in the forest. With the ancient artifact, the queen would be able to orgasm, turn back the clock, and restore their kingdom.

content_descriptors.notes:
・This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, BDSM, bestiality, sexual encounters with tentacles and monsters.
・All characters portrayed in this game are over the age of 20.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10+
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10+
  • Processor: 4Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB Dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Loop Queen-Escape Dungeon 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The queen may have Fiara's protection, but the Misty Forest is a dangerous place. Any mistake could cause the queen and her captors to appear in massive Live2D animated CGs. You may even be forced to participate...
